trans-unit.source: Application Insights: Proactive anomaly detection
trans-unit.target: Application Insights: Proactive anomaly detection

trans-unit.source: Application Insights performs deep analysis of your app telemetry and warns you of potential problems.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights performs deep analysis of your app telemetry and warns you of potential problems.

trans-unit.source: Application Insights: Proactive Anomaly Detection
trans-unit.target: Application Insights: Proactive Anomaly Detection

trans-unit.source: Application Insights is in preview.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights is in preview.

trans-unit.source: Application Insights performs deep analysis of your app telemetry, and can warn you about potential performance problems.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights performs deep analysis of your app telemetry, and can warn you about potential performance problems.

trans-unit.source: You're probably reading this because you received one of our anomaly alerts by email.
trans-unit.target: You're probably reading this because you received one of our anomaly alerts by email.

trans-unit.source: About the anomaly alert
trans-unit.target: About the anomaly alert

trans-unit.source: Why have I received this alert?
trans-unit.target: Why have I received this alert?

trans-unit.source: Application Insights periodically analyzes your data with pattern recognition rules.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights periodically analyzes your data with pattern recognition rules.

trans-unit.source: It looks for anomalies that might indicate performance issues in your application.
trans-unit.target: It looks for anomalies that might indicate performance issues in your application.

trans-unit.source: Does the notification mean I definitely have a problem?
trans-unit.target: Does the notification mean I definitely have a problem?

trans-unit.source: No.
trans-unit.target: No.

trans-unit.source: It's simply a suggestion about something you might want to look at more closely.
trans-unit.target: It's simply a suggestion about something you might want to look at more closely.

trans-unit.source: What should I do?
trans-unit.target: What should I do?

trans-unit.source: [Look at the data presented](#responding-to-an-alert) and consider whether it might represent a problem.
trans-unit.target: [Look at the data presented](#responding-to-an-alert) and consider whether it might represent a problem.

trans-unit.source: If not, that's fine.
trans-unit.target: If not, that's fine.

trans-unit.source: So, do you guys look at my data?
trans-unit.target: So, do you guys look at my data?

trans-unit.source: No.
trans-unit.target: No.

trans-unit.source: The service is entirely automatic.
trans-unit.target: The service is entirely automatic.

trans-unit.source: Only you get the notifications.
trans-unit.target: Only you get the notifications.

trans-unit.source: Your data is [private](app-insights-data-retention-privacy.md).
trans-unit.target: Your data is [private](app-insights-data-retention-privacy.md).

trans-unit.source: The detection process
trans-unit.target: The detection process

trans-unit.source: What kinds of anomalies are detected?
trans-unit.target: What kinds of anomalies are detected?

trans-unit.source: Patterns that you would find it time-consuming to check for yourself.
trans-unit.target: Patterns that you would find it time-consuming to check for yourself.

trans-unit.source: For example, poor performance in a specific combination of location, time of day and platform.
trans-unit.target: For example, poor performance in a specific combination of location, time of day and platform.

trans-unit.source: Can I create my own anomaly detection rules?
trans-unit.target: Can I create my own anomaly detection rules?

trans-unit.source: Not for this kind of deep analysis.
trans-unit.target: Not for this kind of deep analysis.

trans-unit.source: (But you can [set up alerts](app-insights-alerts.md) that tell you when a metric crosses a threshold.)
trans-unit.target: (But you can [set up alerts](app-insights-alerts.md) that tell you when a metric crosses a threshold.)

trans-unit.source: How often is the analysis performed?
trans-unit.target: How often is the analysis performed?

trans-unit.source: We don't perform analysis on an app resource that doesn't get much telemetry.
trans-unit.target: We don't perform analysis on an app resource that doesn't get much telemetry.

trans-unit.source: You're unlikely to get warnings about your debugging sessions.
trans-unit.target: You're unlikely to get warnings about your debugging sessions.

trans-unit.source: Responding to an alert
trans-unit.target: Responding to an alert

trans-unit.source: Open the anomaly report either from the email or from the anomalies list.
trans-unit.target: Open the anomaly report either from the email or from the anomalies list.

trans-unit.source: Notice:
trans-unit.target: Notice:

trans-unit.source: The description
trans-unit.target: The description

trans-unit.source: The impact statement, which tells you how many or how often users are affected.
trans-unit.target: The impact statement, which tells you how many or how often users are affected.

trans-unit.source: Click a chart to open a blade that has more detail.
trans-unit.target: Click a chart to open a blade that has more detail.

trans-unit.source: Modify the time range and filters to explore the telemetry.
trans-unit.target: Modify the time range and filters to explore the telemetry.

trans-unit.source: Notification emails
trans-unit.target: Notification emails

trans-unit.source: Do I have to subscribe to this service in order to receive notifications?
trans-unit.target: Do I have to subscribe to this service in order to receive notifications?

trans-unit.source: No.
trans-unit.target: No.

trans-unit.source: Our bot periodically surveys the data from all Application Insights users, and sends notifications if it detects problems.
trans-unit.target: Our bot periodically surveys the data from all Application Insights users, and sends notifications if it detects problems.

trans-unit.source: Can I unsubscribe or get the notifications sent to my colleagues instead?
trans-unit.target: Can I unsubscribe or get the notifications sent to my colleagues instead?

trans-unit.source: Click the link in the alert or email.
trans-unit.target: Click the link in the alert or email.

trans-unit.source: Open anomaly settings.
trans-unit.target: Open anomaly settings.

trans-unit.source: Currently they're sent to those who have [write access to the Application Insights resource](app-insights-resources-roles-access-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Currently they're sent to those who have [write access to the Application Insights resource](app-insights-resources-roles-access-control.md).

trans-unit.source: I don't want to be flooded with these messages.
trans-unit.target: I don't want to be flooded with these messages.

trans-unit.source: They are limited to three per day.
trans-unit.target: They are limited to three per day.

trans-unit.source: You won't get repeats of any message.
trans-unit.target: You won't get repeats of any message.

trans-unit.source: If I don't do anything, will I get a reminder?
trans-unit.target: If I don't do anything, will I get a reminder?

trans-unit.source: No, you get a message about each issue only once.
trans-unit.target: No, you get a message about each issue only once.

trans-unit.source: I lost the email.
trans-unit.target: I lost the email.

trans-unit.source: Where can I find the notifications in the portal?
trans-unit.target: Where can I find the notifications in the portal?

trans-unit.source: In the Application Insights overview of your app, click the **Anomalies** tile.
trans-unit.target: In the Application Insights overview of your app, click the **Anomalies** tile.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
